event.name: Cloud Native Days Italy
event.description: Cloud Native Days (CND) Italy is a local, community-organized event that gathers adopters and technologists from open source and cloud native communities.

icons.alt: Cloud Native Days Italy on LinkedIn

hero.title: Cloud Native Days Italy 2026
hero.description: The 18 and 19 May 2026, the Italian cloud native community will come together in Bologna for two unforgettable days of sharing, learning and connection. Be part of it!

info.title: About Cloud Native Days Italy
info.description: Cloud Native Days Italy is a community-driven event in Italy dedicated to cloud native and open source technologies.
info.longDescription: Born from the passion of the Italian tech community, it brings together developers, adopters, and enthusiasts to connect, learn, and grow together. Now in its fifth edition, the event has become a reference point where people from all backgrounds and experience levels meet, share stories, and shape the future of cloud native in Italy; together.

talks.title: Technical Talks
talks.description: Learn from the best in the industry about the latest trends and technologies in the cloud-native space.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Meet and connect with like-minded professionals and experts from the cloud-native community.

workshop.title: Workshops
workshop.description: Get hands-on experience with cloud-native technologies and tools in our workshops.

proposal.rollingSelectionText: We evaluate proposals as they are submitted. Submitting early increases your chances of being selected as one of our first speakers!

tickets.comingSoonText: Tickets will be available soon. Follow our social media for announcements!

type.name: Blind Bird
type.description: Two day conference ticket. The very first tickets for a limited time.

type.name: Conference ‚Äì Early Bird
type.description: Two day conference ticket. Get your ticket at a discounted price.

type.name: Conference ‚Äì Regular
type.description: Two day conference ticket. Standard admission to the main conference days.

become.title: Become a Sponsor
become.description: Cloud Native Days Italy is made possible by the support of our sponsors. We offer various sponsorship packages to fit your needs.

active.title: Our Sponsors
active.description: Thank you to our amazing sponsors who make this event possible!
